text: Assassin's Creed is a series of historical action-adventure game made by Ubisoft. The series is about a fictional millennia-old struggle between the Order of Assassins, who fight for peace and free will, and the Knights Templar, who desire peace through order and control. ==Release history== The following table lists the main and spin-off games of the franchise, along with their release years and the respective platform(s) they released on: Title Released Platform Main series
